markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swift Swimmer](/Feats.aspx?ID=5642) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=760" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 27 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You gain a swim Speed of 15 feet.

**Special** If you have the [wetlander lizardfolk heritage](/Heritages.aspx?ID=345), your swim Speed instead increases to 25 feat.
name: Swift Swimmer
